ygData.subject: Re: Large Ruby
ygData.msgSnippet: I have killed chomper, he is easy.  Like slashing a regular fish.  He drops a large ruby, but it s a lore item.  The ruby that you need for the quest isn t a
ygData.messageBody:
I have killed chomper, he is easy. Like slashing a regular fish. He drops
a large ruby, but it's a lore item. The ruby that you need for the quest
isn't a lore item. The only way I know of to get them is buying them off of
an npc merchant. I, being a barbarian, have not tried giving the ruby from
chomper. But I've had someone else do it and it dosn't work. I would be
very interested in finding out who drops a regular ruby if anyone knows. Oh
and I have a brutechopper, I love it 17dmg 50 delay.

Arathorne, sol ro


>From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
>Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
>To: "'warriors_eq@onelist.com'" <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Large Ruby
>Date: Tue, 22 Jun 1999 13:59:18 -0400
>
>From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
>
>Hrm,
>
>Thats odd. Crappy too. I feel like emailing the guys over at EQ'lizer and
>asking them where the heck they got the ruby from in innothule swamp.
>
>The only mob that i have heard of that drops a ruby is the fish called
>Chomper or something of the like in the rivervale lake. Someone posted that
>a few weeks ago on this list. Im not sure how hard of a mob he is but i can
>imagine killing a fish isnt too too easy. Especially one that drops rubies.
>
>Anyway if someone finds out what drops this ruby in Innothule be sure to
>let
>me know.
>
>Thanks
>
>John
>
